name: Be Light
description:
STORY
You are a particle of light that is trying to get out of the darkness. Your job is to place Shockwave emitters and use them to get higher. The only way to go is up. If you fall down, another particle rises.

CONTROLS
Use Mouse click to create a entity that will emit Shockwaves. The higher you will go, the more entities will you be able to place. Try landing on platforms to ease the tension. The yellow glowing line represents your highest distance. Press R to restart and ESC to quit.

CRITERIA
Criterion #1: Shockwave
You need to place Shockwave emitting entities to push yourself higher and higher towards the light. There are other entities you can use that are triggering Shockwaves around the world.

CREDITS
The game made for jamDNA 11 The whole game was made within the 96 hours of jamDNA We made it all by ourselves.
